page.title: 10Superstitions In Our Area
page.content: Weston Turville is a very old village,but still in 1985 stories of the supernatural are about. The Red Lady: a lady who was wearing a red dress was walking her dog up and down Mill Lane,Weston Turville when she needed a rest.There was an old barn called "Mill Barn".She went inside and sat on a bale of hay.While she was resting bales of hay fell on top of her and she suffocated.Now she still walks her dog up and down Mill Lane. Aston Clinton is a very old village with an old Roman Road running through called Akeman Street.Also there is the site of the old moat. Bedgrove being a very recent estate has no old sites at all.
